name: Elemental Rule
effects: Reduce resistance to all elements by 30% for 3 turns to all enemies

name: Elemental Rule
元素法則
속성의 법칙
Règle élémentaire
Elementarregel
Regla elemental
desc_short: Reduce all elemental resistances for all enemies
降低全體敵人火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值
적 전체의 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력 감소
Réduit la rés. feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres de tous les ennemis
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel, alle Verb.
Reduce la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad de todos los enemigos
desc_long: Reduces all elemental resistances for all enemies.
降低全體敵人火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值。
